description: The pandemic has left one of southern France's prettiest villages almost deserted during a second lockdown.
title: France's rural idyll threatened by coronavirus lockdown
title_page: France's rural idyll threatened by coronavirus lockdown - BBC News
maintext: Bruniquel is one of France's most beautiful villages and about an hour north of Toulouse. Don't take my word for it - there is a special rare sign at the entrance that says so. Fewer than 160 villages in France have earned the right to put that sign up.
